entry.summary: For this challenge we will use a fake credit card dataset that is attached as df.csv. which includes information from a public Kaggle dataset with three added fields: activated_date, last_payment_date and fraud. entry.title: Where is my money going.
entry.summary: Where is my money going. I think I have been spending a lot of my money on Amazon but I am not sure, lets take a look. Going to start by importing the libraries im going to use. import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt Read File and rename Colums to something easier to read. bank = pd.read_excel('excel.xlsx') colums=['Date', 'Description', 'Deposits','Price'] bank.columns=colums...
